mapper.sql: AutoID, UserCode, UserName, PhoneNum, PassWord, NickName, Integration, date_format(CreateDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CreateDate, EMail, UserType, Status, Friends

update sys_rbac_user
UserCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PhoneNum = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PassWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMail = #{EMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserType = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Friends = #{friends,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_rbac_user set UserCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PhoneNum = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PassWord = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Integration = #{integration,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMail = #{EMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserType = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Friends = #{friends,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AutoID = #{autoID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select from sys_rbac_user where 1=1
AND UserName like CONCAT('%', #{keywords},'%')
